artist: Engraver: A.B. Duhamel; Artist: after Augustus Charles Pugin; Author: Jean-Antoine Lebrun-Tossa; Publisher: François Buisson
catalogue_raissonne: Colas 1936; Cabinet des Modes; Le Brun
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Trifold sheet from fashion periodical (P.15,312.1); two women in fashionable period dress sit in a green and white striped carriage with green wheels pulled by four rearing white horses; a man in yellow breeches, a green coat, and a black hat holds the reins and sits on a legless stag at the front of the long carriage; another man dressed exactly as the other sits astride one the front horses pulling the carriage
portfolio: From Magasin des Modes nouvelles, françaises et anglaises, Paris, 1786-89
title: Fashion plate from Magasin des Modes Nouvelles, Troisième Année, Vingt-troisième Cahier, 30 Juin 1788
